bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I like to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 I make something sweet.
🌻 I collect pollen.
🐝 My name rhymes with 'bee'.

bug.question: I crawl on the ground, I work with my friends and I like sweet things. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small.
💪 I can carry things many times my own weight.
🧺 I often live in a colony.

bug.question: I have colorful wings, I start as a caterpillar, and I love flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I am a symbol of beauty.
🌿 I go through metamorphosis.
💐 I like to drink nectar.

bug.question: I hop around in the grass, I have long legs and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I am often green.
🎶 My sound is often heard in summer.
Jump! I can jump very high.

bug.question: I build webs to catch my food, and I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ Some people are scared of me.
🕷️ I am not an insect.
🏡 I make my own home.

bug.question: I light up at night and fly around. What am I?

hints.text: 💡I glow in the dark.
✨I am a type of beetle.
🌙I am seen during the night.

bug.question: I can be green or brown and blend in with leaves. I eat leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃I mimic the thing I eat.
🪴I am really good at camouflage.
🌳My shape helps me hide in a tree.

bug.question: I have a hard shell and can be many colors. I am a type of beetle. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I'm good luck to some.
🪲 I might have spots.
🪴 I eat aphids.

bug.question: I make a loud buzzing sound and can be annoying when I bite. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I drink blood.
🌊 I often breed near water.
🤚 You might slap when it's near you.

bug.question: I am known for my strong jaws. I march in lines. I am often found eating wood. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 Some build very large homes.
🪵 Some eat wood.
🛠️ Some can cause damage to houses.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love peanuts! Who am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I like to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am very large and grey.
💧 I use my nose to spray water.

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I eat grass in a field.
🐄 I have black and white spots (sometimes).
🥛 You drink what I make.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I have spots all over my body.
🌳 I'm the tallest animal on land.
🍃 I love to eat acacia leaves.

animal.question: I roar loudly and I'm often called the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a big mane around my neck (if I'm male).
🦁 I live in Africa.
🍖 I am a carnivore.

animal.question: I waddle, lay eggs, and love to swim. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I might live in a very cold place.
🐧 I am a bird, but I cannot fly.
🐟 I like to eat fish.

animal.question: I hop around and have a pouch for my baby. Who am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I live in Australia.
🦘 I have strong legs for jumping.
🌿 I eat plants.

animal.question: I'm a reptile with a hard shell on my back and I move very slowly. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I can live for a very long time.
🥬 I like to eat leafy greens.
🏖️ I sometimes lay eggs on the beach.

animal.question: I fly at night and I use echolocation to find my way. What am I?

hints.text: 🦇 I sleep upside down in caves.
🍎 Some of my relatives like to eat fruit.
🦟 Some of my relatives eat insects.

animal.question: I can change colors to blend in with my surroundings. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦎 I have a long, sticky tongue to catch insects.
🌳 I live in trees in warm places.
👁️ My eyes can move independently.

animal.question: I live in the ocean, have eight arms, and no bones. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can squeeze through very small spaces.
🎨 I can squirt ink to escape from predators.
🌊 I'm a very intelligent invertebrate.
